data.title: JUR - MOLOYA
data.meta_description: A Poetic Journey of Juri Goswami
data.text:
KOT…

ki hobo, jodi moi kow

sompa wati nodir parot

ase tumaloi roi

tumar asar tumar sopun

pal tora tori hoi……………….

JAATRA…

ujai ne bbhotiai

kundise uti jabo dinga

dhoueu najane thikona

torar gojali jen ronga ronga met mora

kumolia xopunor bhar

esab dusabkoi botha bai

gusi jai paltora dingakhoni mur

paror xuoni gaw..

andharot burgole bhatiali gau..

uti jai komua kopah jen

jiyna pakhiti jen

kumolia xopunor bhar

mohona palegoi

jabo eri sage

noholeba loijabo pokonia pake.

SUBHESSHYA….

Suveshare kiman aru kosorot koriba bondhu?

Ebar belitu

Amaloi pothuar babe

Ebar jironir babe

Ratitu

shristikortai

amloi buli pothuwar babe

Akaow ebar ratir jironi agote …………

Aru?????????????????????????

majot kolija khonor

uxah nixah bur

xukan hoi juar porotu ebaru xudhar ahori nai

gorm gorom humuniaheu nusue tumak

enkoi hole moi tumar xohojatry kanekoi hom kuwa?

kotha bur boholai koboloi xikiba

mur kotha ,tumar kotha, amrkothai ,sutalot

dhup khlibo lagibo bondhu!!!!!!!!!!!

tetiahe kotha bur ghore ghore sumai

suburi hobo.

edin suburi bur gaw hobo

gaw bur ghuronia hoi prithibi hobo.Tar babe tumie moie kotha patibo lagibo …

Juri Goswami

31/ 3/12

KIHOR BABE…. ???

ETA XOBDO ,ASARI KOTHA

PORHIBOR BABE HE MOI URETU DIN ROI THAKU

BHAGORE JUGORE MELI SAU XITAN

NAI KARU XOMOI NAI…

KOBI BONDHU SOKOL

SONDHIA POROT KIBA ETA TUKUA

AXARI KOBITARE….. JURUANA HRIDOI.. JURUA..

BOHAGOR JUNAKOT JUNAKI PORUA BUR

NAMI AHIBO SUTALOLOI….

BUKUJURAI BOI THAKIBO SONALI KETEKIR XUBAS,,,

KIMAN BHAL LAGIBO…… BAH BAH….

LIKHA NA….. KIBAETA

KUMOL KOBITA!!!!!!!!!

JURI

2/4/12

BOKUL…

bokulor kotha bhabisu…

sitor kotha pahorilaneki?

ejar nijar porar pasot je ahisil!!!!!!!!!!!!!

juir pohore je tani nisil duhat….

muthi bhorai sumai disil

dumuthi dumuthi jui…………..

kaku nokoi bukute bhorai rakhilu….

bukur pohorot mkhon halodhia hol

tumi bhabila ……

moi hahilu buli!!!!!

seyehe bohagok tumak di

moi bokulor kotha bhabisu

xitol pose mon …..

BOKUL…

bokulor kotha bhabisu…

sitor kotha pahorilaneki?

ejar nijar porar pasot je ahisil!!!!!!!!!!!!!

juir pohore je tani nisil duhat….

muthi bhorai sumai disil

dumuthi dumuthi jui…………..

kaku nokoi bukute bhorai rakhilu….

bukur pohorot mkhon halodhia hol

tumi bhabila ……

moi hahilu buli!!!!!

seyehe bohagok tumak di

moi bokulor kotha bhabisu

xitol pose mon …..

XUGONDHI….

Hetulukar matot

nahor phulil bandhoi…

duporor rodot dekisane

boga nahoror doul????????

hetuluka eti… pori ore rati

tatei pagol hol!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1

xugharn..botahe buwai nile

duroniloi….

hetuluka tu sokur posarote

atori go,….. halodhia nahoror

renu sur kora mousumik

bononit bisari gol.

bihuloi mathu saridin …

alphulia..nahore janu

paribo rakhibo dhori..?

hetuluka tir

moromor

premor sugondhi bul..?

nahor gudhot

pri thibi amul mul.

kun ba jabohi bhul?

.

aji nohoi ……… ,bihu ahu ahu

kopu keti togore lole rong.

tayei hetulukar khong…

nahorore ter eibar milisil mon

hetuluk…hetuluk…

nahore nubujar dukh…

SIPA…

rati rati murtut sipa goje!!

sipa bur bogai jai

xirai upoxirai

khamusi si loi bukut.

rati rati xipa bure gan gai

xuoronir ekhila ekhila

pat lutiai………

korobat thake togor khorika jai,

korobat gulap kolite xukai……….

rati rati xipa bure gan gai

xit hole xawali xorai

noholeba bagori jai bogua bai

xai sipar muhote moi asu jiai

PREM…

Prem!!!!!!

kinu baru?

jar xorirot thake puwa nupuwar

misil rong….

hahi hahi ahi ji

hahi bur sur kri

gusi jai atori,

ebar prem ahi podulit rolei tumi jibonoloi xukhi

hoi jabopara..

osoriri ei rohoishyak

jidinai tumi xoriror

xoite ekatmo kori loba

xei dinai arombho hobo

dukhor din…..

dukhor gorom humuniah…..

prem ejoni dhunia suwali nohoi

prem eta dhunia lorau nooi,,

prem ek topossyar nam matra,

bedonar nam tumi moi dia.

jatonar nam bukuedia

prem tumar poduliloi ahor babei tumi

su bhogia……

juri goswami
